ContactPairs¶

orbitpy.contactfinder.ContactPairs(entityA, entityA_state_cart_fl, entityB, entityB_state_cart_fl)¶

Function returns a namedtuple class to store entity pairs (entityA, entityB) where each entity can be a orbitpy.util.Spacecraft or orbitpy.util.GroundStation object. In case the entity is a spacecraft, the corresponding Cartesian state file path (entityA_state_cart_fl/ entityB_state_cart_fl), which file contains the states of the spacecraft at different times of the mission is stored.
